identity.name: BdAsk.com - Premium AI Assistant
identity.visual_mood: Glassmorphism 2.0 - High saturation, heavy blur, depth, vivid 3D accents

typography.instructions: Import 'Manrope' and 'Hind Siliguri' from Google Fonts. Use Manrope for numbers and English UI elements. Use Hind Siliguri for ALL Bengali text.

glassmorphism.instruction: Apply to all cards, sticky headers, and bottom navigation.

borders.shimmer: border border-transparent bg-gradient-to-r from-transparent via-white/20 to-transparent bg-[length:200%_100%] animate-shimmer

3d_icons.implementation: Wrap Lucide icons in a container with 'bg-gradient-to-br from-white/20 to-white/5 border border-white/20 rounded-2xl shadow-lg'. Add 'drop-shadow-md' to the icon SVG itself.

layout_strategies.mobile_nav: Floating Glass Bar (Apple Style) - Detached from bottom by 16px, rounded-full, blurred.
layout_strategies.dashboard_grid: Bento Grid - Use varied span sizes. Hero widget (Weather/Greeting) spans full width.
layout_strategies.chat_interface: Bubbles must be distinct. User: Gradient Ocean. AI: Glass Dark/Light. Input area: Floating capsule.
layout_strategies.spacing: Relaxed. Use p-6 or p-8 inside cards. Gap-4 or Gap-6 between grid items.

buttons.primary: bg-gradient-to-r from-cyan-500 to-blue-500 hover:from-cyan-600 hover:to-blue-600 text-white shadow-lg shadow-cyan-500/25 rounded-xl font-semibold transition-all hover:scale-105 active:scale-95
buttons.glass: bg-white/10 hover:bg-white/20 text-foreground border border-white/10 backdrop-blur-md rounded-xl transition-all

cards.base: bg-card/50 backdrop-blur-xl border border-border/50 rounded-2xl shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all hover:bg-card/60

inputs.search: bg-background/50 border border-white/10 rounded-full py-3 px-6 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-cyan-500/50 transition-all backdrop-blur-sm

page_transitions.enter: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} transition={{ duration: 0.4, ease: 'easeOut' }}

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. UPDATE tailwind.config.js to include the new color palette and fonts.
2. UPDATE index.css to add the custom 'mesh' background utilities and @font-face imports.
3. CREATE a 'GlassCard' component in /components/ui/glass-card.jsx that implements the glassmorphism logic.
4. REFACTOR the Bottom Navigation to be a floating capsule instead of a fixed bottom bar.
5. REFACTOR the Home Screen to use a Bento Grid layout.
6. APPLY the '3d-icon-style' to all category icons.
7. ENSURE Dark Mode is the default or at least the 'premium' experience.
8. MAINTAIN Bengali text legibility by ensuring line-height is at least 1.6.
9. DO NOT remove existing functionality (Prayer times, Currency, etc.), just restyle them.
10. Use 'framer-motion' for smooth entrance animations on all cards.
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
